resources.string:
I love OpenSource!
Thank you for your great libraries.

Special thanks to beli3ver and jklmnn for their continued support!
Check this project out on GitHub!

Version 1.5 (Matthias Goebl)
- Hide numbers used for ordering list entries ("1. ", "2. ",..), but not for headings
- Interpret list entries containing "***" as headlines and show them in bold face and prevent unticking
- Added option to rename and delete a selected item
- Added option to add item by scanning a qr code (needs backend support)
- Option to hide checked items
- Menu access to cached list, save checkmarks in cached list
- Added option to scan QR code using the front camera (for a wall mounted tablet)
- Added save and update of checked attribute

Version 1.4
- Quick setup with QR Code
(App "Barcode Scanner" required, also available in FDroid)
- Added categories for items
- Added possibility to check for backend updates
- Added translation for predictions

Version 1.3
- Added predictions
- Removed unused library
- Backend compatibility check
- Host url does not have to end with / or api.php anymore
- When no item is selected, question if list should be cleared

Version 1.2
Skipped due to my incompetence :)

Version 1.1

WORKS ONLY WITH NEW BACKEND!
- Multiple bugfixes
- Improved error handling
- Add favorites from current list
- Add multiple items from favorites
- Select and then remove multiple items
- New icon (Thanks beli3ver!)
